title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the perfect hearing protection solution for your shooting range needs. Designed with the utmost care and consideration for your comfort and convenience, these earmuffs provide exceptional features and characteristics that are easily accessible to the elderly folks.

Featuring high-definition speakers, you can experience crystal clear sound while ensuring your hearing is protected. The sound activation technology in these earmuffs reacts in just 0.02 seconds, offering you unparalleled safety. With independent volume controls, you have the freedom to adjust the sound to your liking.

With a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs effectively minimize external noise, allowing you to focus on your shooting experience. Equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, you can stay aware of your surroundings without compromising on protection.

The audio input jack enables you to connect your favorite devices, so you can enjoy your preferred music or audio while at the range. The recessed volume control knobs provide easy and precise adjustment, ensuring your comfort and convenience.

Powered by two AAA batteries (included), these earmuffs offer long-lasting performance. The compact dimensions of 8.10 inches in length, 4.60 inches in width, and 10.60 inches in height make them easy to carry and store. Weighing just 0.98 pounds, they are lightweight and won't cause any discomfort during use.

The comfortable headband, made with a metal wire frame, ensures a snug fit and lasting comfort. Additionally, the earmuffs are foldable, making storage a breeze.

Crafted with a composite housing for effective sound dampening, these earmuffs deliver an exceptional shooting experience while prioritizing your safety and comfort.

Experience the ultimate in hearing protection with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Don't miss out on this perfect companion for your shooting range adventures.

Invest in your hearing protection with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Experience the best of both worlds: exceptional sound quality and reliable noise reduction. Stay safe and enjoy your shooting range experience to the fullest.

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the perfect hearing protection for your shooting range adventures! Designed specifically for elderly folks who may be easily confused, these earmuffs are packed with features and characteristics that are easy to understand and use.

- **High-Definition Speakers:** Immerse yourself in crystal-clear sound with high-definition speakers that deliver exceptional audio quality.

- **Sound Activation:** The earmuffs feature a quick sound compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, ensuring that your hearing is protected instantly. Plus, enjoy the convenience of independent volume controls for a personalized listening experience.

- **Noise Reduction Rating:** With a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs effectively block out harmful noise, allowing you to enjoy your shooting experience while keeping your ears safe.

- **Dual Omnidirectional Microphones:** The earmuffs come equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, providing enhanced sound detection and clarity.

- **Audio Input Jack:** Connect your favorite devices to the earmuffs using the audio input jack, allowing you to listen to music or take calls while still protecting your ears.

- **Recessed Volume Control Knobs:** Adjust the volume easily and precisely with recessed volume control knobs that are easy to locate and use.

- **Long-Lasting Power:** The earmuffs are powered by two included AAA batteries, ensuring long-lasting performance throughout your shooting sessions.

- **Compact and Lightweight:** With dimensions of 8.1 inches in length, 4.6 inches in width, and 10.6 inches in height, these earmuffs are compact and lightweight, making them easy to carry and store.

- **Comfortable Headband:** The earmuffs feature a comfortable metal wire frame headband that provides a secure and cozy fit, ensuring hours of comfortable wear. Plus, they are foldable for convenient storage.

- **Composite Housing:** The earmuffs are constructed with a composite housing material that provides excellent sound dampening, enhancing your shooting experience.

Stay safe and enjoy your shooting range activities with ease using the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Upgrade your hearing protection today!
